channel.title: Music Videos on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Music Videos on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Post Punk Podge - Gentrification Nation (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Videography, Editing Watch Here A music video for ‘Gentrification Nation’ by Post Punk Podge, looking at gentrification and change in Limerick City

item.title: SORBET - Born Purple (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Videography, Visual Algorithms, Editing Watch Here A music video I made which reflects the song’s anthropocene theme in an understated, locally-specific way. Generative computational techniques are utilised to collage video clips of various processes of exchange and energy transfer, and these images are brought into dialogue with the Limerick/Tipperary landscape, to inspire reflection on human processes and their cumulative impact on the local landscape. I also contributed lyrics and vocals to the song under the pseudonym ‘mickykiiatein’.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Trapped (360 MV)
item.description: Concept, Direction, Generative Visuals, Editing Watch Here An interactive VR music video that I made under the restrictions of strict COVID-19 lockdown in May 2020. Old footage of the band was recycled and combined with algorithmic visuals to create something new. The viewer is surrounded with abstract construction in the VR world, echoing the songs lyrical themes of confinement and entrapment.

item.title: His Father's Voice - Close (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Videographer Watch here A simple, atmospheric video for ‘Close’ by His Father’s Voice, using a pinhole camera. Features dancing by Graham Patterson.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Anything You Want (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Performer, Editor Watch here Music video for ‘Anything You Want’ by Bleeding Heart Pigeons, depicting repressed fantasies of a dairy farmer.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Visiting Myself in Hospital (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Performer, Editor Watch Here Music video for ‘Visiting Myself in Hospital’ by Bleeding Heart Pigeons. Very early stuff. You could say juvenilia.
